walk_app - simple parallel erlang file tree walking application

Version: 1.0.0

walk_app is a simple parallel erlang tree walking OTP application using rebar and OTP framework.

Basic Usage

The basic pattern of use of couchbeam is:

1. Start walk_app

walk_app is an OTP application.It uses plists to parallelise the accessing of files

start walk_app e.g erl -pa apps/*/ebin -boot start_sasl -s walk_app

then walk_app:parallelFileTreeWalk("/").


where "/" is path to start of walk - in this case the whole root filesystem
